item.title: Boostnote
item.description: Introduction Texto introducci√≥n Here’s an example: ````bash this is a comment echo this is a command this is a command edit the file vi foo.md +++ date = “2014-09-28” title = “creating a new theme” +++ bah and humbug :wq show it cat foo.md +++ date = “2014-09-28” title = “creating a new theme” +++ bah and humbug ## Some Definitions There are a few concepts that you need to understand before creating a theme.
